entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
